alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 1:26AM AKST until December 17 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Baranof Island, including Port Alexander. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Visibility will be reduced. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Radar and nearby observations indicate that light snow has likely started near Port Alexander. Snow is expected to continue with greatest snowfall rates expected during the day Friday.
info.instruction: An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
